fieldHint.hint2: Ex: beginner investor, ebook author, home seller, home buyer, etc

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: stock investing, ebook marketing, for sale by owner, home buying, etc.
Ex: pick winning stocks, ebook writing, fsbo, house hunting, etc

fields.fieldTitle: What is NAME / TITLE of what you want them to buy, try, etc.?

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: Stock Investing Playbook; "Selling Your Home Alone"; Neuracel; 5 Secrets To Deleting Nerve Pain; The Biohacker's Guide; Neuropathy Supplements; Funnel Scripts; Webinar Secrets; Big Jim's Running Shoes; Kodak XLR 75; The Speaker's Edge Coaching; etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What "thing" holds the solution they want? (1-2 words)

fieldHint.hint1: "The thing I want them to buy is / are ______." (NOUN)

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: pain reliever, supplement, service, coaching, websites, templates, blueprints, checklist, software, secrets, resources, places, FB Posts, info-graphics, list, guide, digital camera, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: Describe "thing" from previous question to arouse curiosity

fieldHint.hint1: "The thing I want them to buy is definitely ______." (ADJECTIVE)

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: under-the-radar, free, little-known, proven, "black hole", off-the-record, breakthrough, revolutionary, new, etc

fields.fieldTitle: What is the #1 BIG Result they want? (Starts with VERB)

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: pick more money-making stocks; publish your own outrageously profitable ebook; get your home sold for top dollar; buy your own dream home; etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What is the #2 BIG Result they want? (Starts with VERB)

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: earn a double-digit return on your stock investments; create passive income from amazon royalty checks; find a qualified buyer in your timeframe; get a monthly payment you can feel good about; etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What is a Pain they want to avoid in this area?

fieldHint.hint1: "My audience really wants to avoid ______." (VERB ending in "ing")

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: losing money on stocks, trying to write it all yourself, paying a Realtor commission, spending weeks in a car looking at houses, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What is a Roadblock they see as holding them back from their goal?

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: you have never invested in stocks before now, you think you can't write, you have no marketing or sales experience, you have less-than-perfect credit, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: When you wave a magic wand, how fast do they get the big payoff?

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: automatically, quickly, instantly, immediately, fast, in a flash, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: In what timeframe can you deliver results?

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: 30 days; 15 minutes or less; one week; etc.
